channel.title: Getting scratches from granite?
channel.description:
hello,
i know this seems a bit weired but i scratched up my kitchen granite and im tottally fucked if anyone finds out, the scratch isnt very deep and the granite is dark. Does anyone know any methods of getting rid of this or any products that can?
if you dont know please try and re-search it :)
many thx,
solemn wishes.
p.s. im super fucked if i cant get this fixed lool.

item.title: Getting scratches from granite?
item.dc:creator: @solemn_wishes solemn wishes
item.description:
@solemn_wishes wrote:

o ok

Read full topic

item.title: Getting scratches from granite?
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath.v2 Aftermath.v2
item.description:
@Aftermath.v2 wrote:

http://kitchen-remodeling-pictures.com/granite/granite_cleaning.htm

Although there might be products available that claim to "remove" scratches from granite, their claims are pure folly. Think about it - a scratch removes some of the material from the surface. No product, no matter how costly is capable of putting that material back. The best they can do is hide the scratch if it's not too deep.

Read full topic
